headline: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (HII) Eyeing 15% Throughput Improvement for Fiscal 2025
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (NYSE:HII) is among the top 8 defense stocks based on ChatGPT’s advice. On October 30, the company reported financial results for the third quarter of fiscal 2025, with record third quarter sales of $3.2 billion, up 16.1% year-over-year, driven by strong growth across the Ingalls Shipbuilding, Newport News Shipbuilding, and Mission […]
